001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.DisconnectPumpResponse;
011
012/*
013 * I don't actually think calling this command is required... since an app can just disconnect
014 * from the device over Bluetooth and forget the pairing key, and the user needs to re-trigger
015 * a pair in order to connect again anyway (either via menu on tslim X2 or entering "pairing mode"
016 * on the Mobi)
017 */
018
019/**
020 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.DisconnectPumpResponse}, opCode -66, size 0
021 *
022 * <br>
023 *
024 * 
025 * <table border='1'>
026 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-66</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>0</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
029 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
030 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
031 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
032 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control.DisconnectPumpResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
033 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>minApi</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion#MOBI_API_V3_5}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
034 * </table>
035 */@MessageProps(
036    opCode=-66,
037    size=0,
038    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
039    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
040    signed=true,
041    response=DisconnectPumpResponse.class,
042    minApi=KnownApiVersion.MOBI_API_V3_5
043)
044public class DisconnectPumpRequest extends Message { 
045    public DisconnectPumpRequest() {
046        this.cargo = EMPTY;
047    }
048
049    public void parse(byte[] raw) { 
050        raw = this.removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
051        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
052        this.cargo = raw;
053        
054    }
055
056    
057}
